DOC.brief_summary: Assess safety efficacy Cellvizio needle-based Confocal Laser Endomicroscopy ( nCLE ) system differentiate benign malignant premalignant cyst ( e.g . mucinous non-mucinous cyst )

DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study define interpretation criterion differentiate mucinous non-mucinous cyst classify precisely cyst . Once criterion define , diagnostic parameter nCLE differentiate different type cyst reproducibility criterion assess .
